data_description.room_name: Choose a unique name for this room.
data_description.trv_entities: Select one or more climate entities (TRVs) to control in this room.
data_description.main_temp_sensor: Select the primary temperature sensor for this room (optional).
data_description.humidity_sensor: Select a humidity sensor for this room (optional).
data_description.window_sensors: Select binary sensors to detect open windows or doors (optional).
data_description.override_timeout: How long manual TRV changes override schedules (empty = use hub setting).
data_description.hysteresis: Temperature deadband to prevent rapid on/off cycling.
data_description.target_temp_step: Minimum temperature change before sending a new command to the TRV.
data_description.use_pid_control: Enable PID controller for smoother temperature regulation.
data_description.use_hvac_off_for_low_temp: Enable for Moes TRVs that don't support low temperatures.
data_description.use_room_coupling: Enable heat transfer awareness between adjacent rooms.
data_description.adjacent_rooms: Select rooms that share walls with this room.
data_description.coupling_strength: How much to adjust for neighbor heating (0.1=subtle, 1.0=strong).
data_description.pid_kp: Proportional: Reacts to current error. Higher = faster but may overshoot.
data_description.pid_ki: Integral: Eliminates steady error. Higher = faster but may oscillate.
data_description.pid_kd: Derivative: Dampens oscillations. Higher = smoother but slower.
data_description.away_temperature: Target temperature when nobody is home (per room).

remove_mode.title: Remove Custom Mode
remove_mode.description: Remove a custom mode. Default modes (Normal, Homeoffice, Manual, Off) cannot be removed.

panel_settings.title: Hub Configuration
panel_settings.description:
Hub Configuration:

• Panel: Show TaDIY Schedules in sidebar
• Weather Entity: Weather entity for outdoor temperature and forecast
• Person Entities: Person tracking for location-based heating
• Location Mode: Automatic heating reduction when nobody is home
• Override Timeout: How long manual TRV changes override schedules
• Window Timeouts: How long to wait before/after window open/close
• Early Start: Pre-heating settings
• Heating Curve: Adjust target temperature based on outdoor temperature
• Weather Prediction: Pre-heat before cold fronts, reduce before warm fronts

data_description.weather_entity: Weather entity for outdoor temperature and forecast data.
data_description.person_entities: Person entities for presence detection and away mode.
data_description.early_start_offset: Additional buffer minutes to start heating early.
data_description.heating_curve_slope: Higher value = stronger target adjustment at low outdoor temps.
data_description.use_weather_prediction: Pre-heat before cold fronts, reduce heating before warm fronts.
data_description.global_window_open_timeout: Grace period before stopping heating when window opens.
data_description.global_window_close_timeout: Cooldown before resuming heating after window closes.
